attributes.action: accommodate the UK's growing population in a new city, named Braveheart, for 5 million people should be built in the sparsely populated Scottish Highlands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cities and towns in the UK have little room to grow and yet the UK's population is expected to increase by 10-15 million over the coming years. One solution would be to utilise the relatively empty Scottish Highlands to build the world's first 21st Century city.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
